original_text: Hear ye, O mountains, the Lord's controversy, and ye strong foundations of the earth: for the Lord hath a controversy with his people, and he will plead with Israel.
korean_text: 너희 산들과 땅의 견고한 지대들아 너희는 여호와의 변론을 들으라 여호와께서 자기 백성과 변론하시며 이스라엘과 변론하실 것이라

sentences.original_text: and ye strong foundations of the earth
for the Lord hath a controversy with his people
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주께서 그 백성과 다툼이 있으심이라

sentences.original_text: and he will plead with Israel
